<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Inscription Info</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/btc/{network}/inscriptions/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get Ordinals inscription info by inscription ID.

## Request
